pre_caption: In a medium tracking shot, a man is consistently framed in the center of the screen and occupies the middle ground. He walks directly away from the camera, moving deeper into the background down a narrow alley. The alley walls are positioned on the left and right sides of the frame, extending from the foreground to the background and creating strong leading lines that converge toward the center. As the man progresses, the brighter end of the alley, located in the center background, becomes more prominent, revealing a perpendicular street where a bus moves from left to right and other pedestrians walk. The camera, positioned at the man's level, moves forward at the same pace, maintaining a constant distance and keeping him centered in the shot.
